type.desc: Set the type of data transformation to pie, used to calculate the pie layout, implementing common pie charts

field.desc: The field corresponding to the proportion in the pie chart

startAngle.desc: Starting angle, can be omitted, default value is 0

endAngle.desc: End angle, can be omitted, default value is 2 * Math.PI

asStartAngle.desc: Set the field to store the starting angle data of each sector. If not set, the corresponding starting angle data will not be stored

asEndAngle.desc: Set the field to store the end angle data of each sector. If not set, the corresponding end angle data will not be stored

asMiddleAngle.desc: Set the field to store the middle angle data of each sector. If not set, the corresponding middle angle data will not be stored

asRadian.desc: Set the field to store the radian value data of each sector. If not set, the corresponding radian data will not be stored

asRatio.desc: Set the field to store the proportion data of each sector. If not set, the corresponding proportion data will not be stored

asQuadrant.desc: Calculate the quadrant where the end angle of each sector is located and save the result to the specified field. If not set, the corresponding quadrant data will not be stored

asK.desc: Calculate the ratio of data corresponding to each sector to the maximum value and save the result to the specified field. If not set, the corresponding ratio data will not be stored
